GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.39 to before v5.18.4
GSD.description:
firmware: dmi-sysfs: Fix memory leak in dmi_sysfs_register_handle

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit ec752973aa721ee281d5441e497364637c626c7b, it was introduced in version v2.6.39 by commit 948af1f0bbc8526448e8cbe3f8d3bf211bdf5181. For more details please see the references link.
